mapper.sql: id, product, member, create_date, ip, iplat, iplng, nation, province, city, district, adcode, company_id, area, address, name, hospital, department, phone, mobile, content, type, email, is_delete, status, admin_id
mapper.select:
SELECT B.name ,COUNT(A.id) countNum ,A.type FROM tf_demonstration_statistics A ,tf_product B WHERE A.product = B.id
AND A.type = #{dtype,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( A.create_date) <= 1
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(A.create_date)
AND PERIOD_DIFF( date_format( now( ) , '%Y%m' ) , date_format( A.create_date, '%Y%m' ) ) = 1
AND year(A.create_date)=year(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year))
and A.create_date BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
GROUP BY B.name

SELECT province AS name ,COUNT(id) AS countNum ,type FROM tf_demonstration_statistics WHERE 1 = 1
AND type = #{dtype,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND TO_DAYS( NOW( ) ) - TO_DAYS( create_date) <= 1
AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) <= DATE(create_date)
AND PERIOD_DIFF( date_format( now( ) , '%Y%m' ) , date_format(create_date, '%Y%m' ) ) = 1
AND year(create_date)=year(date_sub(now(),interval 1 year))
and create_date BETWEEN #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
GROUP BY province

SELECT A.mon,COALESCE(B.countNum,0) AS countNum FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-01') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-02') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-03') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year},'-04') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-05') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-06') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-07') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-08') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-09') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-10') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-11') AS mon UNION SELECT CONCAT(#{year} ,'-12') AS mon ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m') createTime, COUNT(id) countNum FROM tf_demonstration_statistics WHERE type = 0 AND company_id = #{companyId} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%Y-%m') ) B ON A.mon = B.createTime ORDER BY A.mon
mapper.insert: insert into tf_demonstration_statistics (id, product, member, create_date, ip, iplat, iplng, nation, province, city, district, adcode, company_id, area, address, name, hospital, department, phone, mobile, content, type, email, is_delete, status, admin_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{product,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{member,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iplat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iplng,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{area,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospital,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{department,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{adminId,jdbcType=BIGINT})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
